From the Mayor

Welcome and thank you for visiting the official website for the City of Troy. We are working to make this a valuable interactive tool for the community.

We want to keep you informed about our community and invite you to get involved. City Council meetings are held at 6:00 pm on the second Monday of each month at the Troy Community Center located at 201 East Main Street.

Trash pick-up is performed each Wednesday by the City's contractor (Frontier Waste Solutions). The city offers tree and limb pick-up through Frontier Waste Solutions. The tree and limbs must be cut no more than 4ft. in length, less than 3' in diameter, and tied and bundled into sections weighing no more than 50 lbs. To schedule a pick up, you can call Frontier Waste Solutions directly at 888-854-2905.

If you have suggestions on how we can better serve the community, please feel free to contact us.

Respectfully,
Michael G. Morgan
Mayor, City of Troy
